org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.remotese.nativese

Interface INativeReaderService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SlaveAPI

    public interface INativeReaderService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String connectReader(org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.SeReader localReader)
      Connect Physical Local Reader to Remote SE Creates a Session to exchange data with this Reader with an option to duplex connection

      Connect Physical Local Reader to Remote SE Creates a Session to exchange data with this Reader with an option to duplex connection

      Disconnect Physical Local Reader from RemoteSe Master, nativeReaderName must be used as the identifier of the nativeReader

    • Method Detail

      • connectReader

        java.lang.String connectReader(org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.SeReader localReader)
                        throws org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.exception.KeypleReaderException
        Connect Physical Local Reader to Remote SE Creates a Session to exchange data with this Reader with an option to duplex connection
        Parameters:
        localReader - nativeReader to be connected to Master
        Returns:
        sessionId id of the session of the virtual reader
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.exception.KeypleReaderException - if reader is already connected

      • connectReader

        java.lang.String connectReader(org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.SeReader localReader,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)
                        throws org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.exception.KeypleReaderException
        Connect Physical Local Reader to Remote SE Creates a Session to exchange data with this Reader with an option to duplex connection
        Parameters:
        localReader - nativeReader to be connected to Master
        options - map of parameters to set into the virtual reader see Configurable.getParameters()
        Returns:
        sessionId id of the session of the virtual reader
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.exception.KeypleReaderException - if reader is already connected

      • disconnectReader

        void disconnectReader(java.lang.String sessionId,
                      java.lang.String nativeReaderName)
               throws org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.exception.KeypleReaderException
        Disconnect Physical Local Reader from RemoteSe Master, nativeReaderName must be used as the identifier of the nativeReader
        Parameters:
        sessionId - (optional)
        nativeReaderName - local name of the reader, will be used coupled with the nodeId to identify the virtualReader
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.exception.KeypleReaderException - if reader is not already connected

      • findLocalReader

        org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.SeReader findLocalReader(java.lang.String nativeReaderName)
                                                  throws org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.exception.KeypleReaderNotFoundException
        Find a local reader across plugins
        Parameters:
        nativeReaderName - : native name of the reader to find
        Returns:
        SeReader : Se Reader found
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.exception.KeypleReaderNotFoundException - : if none reader was found
